articleContent:
Dear Rover,
To bring you exciting new content and a better gaming experience, we will soon be conducting the update maintenance for Version 2.2: Tangled Truth in Inverted Tower.
During the maintenance, you will not be able to log in to the game. Please plan your time accordingly. Additionally, due to the large size of the update, we recommend updating the game while connected to a Wi-Fi network. We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
 
[Maintenance Time & Compensation Details]
✦Maintenance Time: 2025-03-27 04:00 - 2025-03-27 11:00 (UTC+8)
✦Maintenance Compensation: Astrite x300, Crystal Solvent x2
✦Compensation Eligibility: Create a character and unlock the Mails feature before 2025-03-27 04:00 (UTC+8). The compensation can be claimed before the next version update.
※In the event that the maintenance is extended, the dev team will issue a follow-up notice and adjust the compensation accordingly.
 
[How to Update]
Once the maintenance for the version update begins, you can follow the following instructions to update your client.
✦PC: Close the game, restart the launcher, and then click on "Update."
✦Android: Launch the game and follow the instructions in the update pop-up window to complete the update.
✦iOS: Download/update the game in the App Store.
✦Mac: Download/update the game in the App Store.
✦PS5™: Open the home screen > Select Wuthering Waves > Press the OPTIONS button to Check for Update
 
[Pre-download on PC Launcher]
The latest version of the official PC launcher for Wuthering Waves, Version 2.0.0, is now available. It introduces the following new features:
①Incremental content updates
②Brand new user interface
③Optimized resource usage
④Access to new functionalities
※You can update the game to Version 2.2 "Tangled Truth in Inverted Tower" by means of an incremental content update. This will significantly reduce the size of game resources that need downloading. To make use of this new feature, update the Wuthering Waves launcher on your PC to Version 2.0.0 first. In addition, we will continue to optimize the game's resource storage associated with version updates, so that resources that need downloading can be further reduced in size for future version updates.
✦PC Pre-download Start Time: 2025-03-25 09:30 (UTC+8)
✦Pre-download Size: 30.8 GB
※With the pre-download feature enabled, "New Version Pre-download" appears below the "Start" button on the launcher interface. Select this option to pre-download the resources for the latest version. You can continue playing the game while the pre-downloading process is ongoing. The process can be paused at any time. Whether pre-downloading finishes or not, initiating it will speed up the update process to a certain degree.
 
[Version 2.2 Preview]
✦New Resonators
5-Star Resonator: Cantarella (Havoc/Rectifier)
※Obtainable through the [Neptune's Lullaby] Featured Resonator Convene.
5-Star Resonator: Rover - Aero (Aero/Sword)
※Complete [Main Quest] Chapter II Act IV "The Maiden, The Defier, The Death Crier" to unlock.
 
✦New Weapons
5-Star Weapon: Whispers of Sirens (Rectifier)
※Obtainable through the [Absolute Pulsation - Whispers of Sirens] Featured Weapon Convene.
5-Star Weapon: Bloodpact's Pledge (Sword)
※Complete [Main Quest] Chapter II Act IV "The Maiden, The Defier, The Death Crier" to obtain.
 
✦New Regions
Avinoleum, Beohr Waters
[Avinoleum] New Way of Exploration
[Gravity Calibrator] Gravity Adjustment
In Avinoleum, interact with Gravity Calibrators to change the direction of gravity in your surroundings and travel to more areas open to exploration.
[Companion] Shared Adventure
For certain tasks in Avinoleum, you and a Companion Resonator can work together to complete them.
 
✦New Echoes
Reminiscence: Fleurdelys, Capitaneus, La Guardia, Sagittario, Sacerdos, Glacio Drake, Electro Drake, Aero Drake, Nightmare: Lampylumen Myriad
New Sonata Set: Gusts of Welkin
Gusts of Welkin (2pcs Set): Aero DMG +10%
Gusts of Welkin (5pcs Set): Inflicting Aero Erosion on enemies increases Aero DMG for all Resonators in the team by 15%, and for the Resonator triggering this effect by an additional 15%, lasting for 20s.
 
✦New Stories
[Main Quest] Chapter II Act IV "The Maiden, The Defier, The Death Crier"
[Cantarella's Companion Quest] A Fleeting Night's Dream
[Exploration Quest] Should the Shooting Stars Blaze
 
✦New Events & Gameplay Features
Special Events
[Avinoleum] Area Events: [Winds of the Past] Area Exploration Event, [Avinoleum Travel Atlas] Featured Exploration Event, [Acropolis Documentarian] Photo Collection Event
 
[Virtual Crisis: Prototype Trials] Crisis Trial Challenge Event
[If You Gaze Into the Abyss of Dreams] Featured Co-op Combat Event
[Lollo Campaign: Set Sail] Featured Commission Event
[Ragunna Weather Forecast] Featured Platforming Event
[Wuthering Exploration] Featured Exploration Event in Whisperwind Haven
[Gifts of the Still Tides] 7-Day Login Event
 
✦Other New Content
New "Tactical Hologram: Phantom Pain" Challenge: Dragon of Dirge
[Titles] Meet specific requirements to obtain honorary Titles
[Phantom Echo] Phantom: Capitaneus
 
※For more details on the new content, optimizations, and bug fixes coming to the game in Version 2.2: Tangled Truth in Inverted Tower, please stay tuned for the upcoming release notes.
 
[Device Requirements]
To ensure a smooth experience, please refer to the following requirements:
 
①Minimum
Android: [System] Android 7.0 or later; [Processor] Snapdragon 835, MediaTek G71/72 or processors of better/equivalent performance; [RAM] 4 GB or more
iOS: [System] iOS 14 or later; [Model] iPhone 11 or newer, iPad with A13 Bionic or processors of better/equivalent performance; [RAM] 4 GB or more
Mac: [System] macOS 12.0 or later; [Model] m1 or newer; [RAM] 16 GB or more
PC: [System] Windows 10 64-bit; [CPU] Intel I5 (9th Gen)/Ryzen 2700; [GPU] Geforce 1060/RX570/Intel ARC A380, [RAM] 16 GB or more
 
②Recommended
Android: [System] Android 7.0 or later; [Processor] Snapdragon 8 Gen1+/Gen2/Gen3 or MediaTek processors of better/equivalent performance; [RAM] 6 GB or more
iOS: [System] iOS 15 or later; [Model] iPhone 13 or newer, iPad with A15 Bionic or processors of better/equivalent performance; [RAM] 6 GB or more
Mac: [System] macOS 12.0 or later; [Model] m3 or newer; [RAM] 16 GB or more
PC: [System] Windows 10 64-bit; [CPU] Intel I7 (9th Gen)/Ryzen 3700, [GPU] Geforce 2060/RX5700XT/Intel ARC A750; [RAM] 16 GB or more
 
③Required Storage Space
Android/iOS: 28 GB
Mac: 60 GB
PC: 60 GB; it's recommended to install the game on an SSD.
PS5™: Please make sure your device has sufficient available storage to complete the update.
 
④Controller Support
Wuthering Waves currently supports the following controllers on Mobile.
Wireless Controllers: Xbox series, Xbox Elite series, DualShock®4, DualSense®, DualSense Edge™
Wuthering Waves currently supports the following controllers on Mac.
Wired/Wireless Controllers: DualShock®4, DualSense®, DualSense Edge™ 
Wireless Controllers: Xbox series
Wuthering Waves currently supports the following controllers on PC.
Wired/Wireless Controllers: Xbox series, Xbox Elite series, DualSense®、DualSense Edge™ 
Wired Controllers: DualShock®4
